name: GOOD SHOT
description:
GOOD SHOT Version 1.05 BY FEEMSOFT

Movement:

Moving around: A, S, D, W-keys

Sprint: shift

Jump: space

Crouch: C-key

Lay-down: Ctrl

Shooting:

Aim down sight: right mouse button

Shoot: left mouse button

Reload: R-key

Other:

Action key: F-key

Grenade = G-key

Knife = E-key

Show highscore: H

0 (digit): reset highscore table

1 (digit): primary weapon

2 (digit): secondairy weapon

Trouble with graphixs card? (experimental)

P: Increase texture size

O: Decrease texture size

When you are in the main menu:

Click on de badge in the top right corner to change the difficulty.

Press the digits (0-6) to go to that level or click on the new game button.

This version contains:

M4 model

Shell ejecting

Bullet collision with wall and floor

Unfinished recoil

Down sight camera

Ammo

Finished recoil

Better bullet collision

Hip fire

Flame out of the gun

Movement

Targets

Unfinished reload animation

Hit indicator & score indicator

Score counter & Highscore table

Small update m4 model

Switch

Accuracy checker

Ammo hud & compas

Smooth aim & better zoom

Gun doesnt goes into the wall

Bullet penetration

Secondairy weapon & Desert Eagle model

Simple enemies

Buildings

Sky

Trees & Barrels

Jumping & Crouching

Blood screen & blood splatters

Updated:

Alot

Next version contains (probably):

MUSIC BY PHILIP CHANCE
